My eyebrows are burnt red, and my skin is dry.
(Tiantong Jing).
"The fire burns the mountain in the waxing crescent moon of the fragrant grove.
The breeze of a cold house backs away to look at it.
He's really treading lightly in the midst of the commotion.
I then realized that it was the third watch of the afternoon.
(Baizhugden).
"The fire burns the mountain in the waxing moon.
The sky is wide and the earth is wide.
When he stands up, he knocks on it.
It chills my bones and hair.
(Songyuan Yue).
"In the waxing moon, a mountain is burned by fire.
The sky is wide and the earth is wide.
The bodhisattva always wails about his suffering.
The market is full of people selling their hearts and livers.
(Plateau Spring).
"The mountain is burned in the waxing moon.
What's the big deal?
The lacquer bucket is unpleasant.
Don't drill it unnecessarily.
(Pao-weng Qian).
[Increased Harvest] Xianglin was asked by a monk.
"What's the living plan of a patched-robe monk?
The master said.
"Planting a field in your ear.
The verse said.
"He plants a field in his ear.
His mouth is full of smoke.
Zhong Kui untied his eighteen beats in the dance.
Zhang Lao rides a raft up to the ninth heaven.
(Wuam Quan).
[Increasing Harvest] Xianglin was asked by a monk.
"Who will be the owner of the ten thousand hectares of barren land?
The master said.
'Let's see if the waxing moon is over.'
The monk replied with a verse.
"The embroidered ball was thrown out in front of the drawing room.
It's marvelously selfless and naturally complete in essence.
It's really a matter of practicing by the sword.
We must see Old Cloud Gate again.
(Shi [(kong*qia)/stone] Ming).
"Who is the owner of ten thousand hectares of barren land?
You must know where the answer comes from.
If there's no one to entrust him with this.
Let's take a look at the end of the waxing moon.
(JIAN Wengjing).
"Look at the end of the waxing moon.
What's your daily bread?
Wealthy people dislike the fact that a thousand mouths are small.
Poverty hates that one person has too many.
(Yun Dianqing).
[Increased Harvest] Xianglin was asked by the monks.
"What's a one-shot lamp in a room?
The master said.
'Three people have realized that a turtle has become a turtle.'
The verse said.
'Six ears of conspiracy don't accomplish anything.
A person who speaks his mind directly shows his red heart.
"Who will poke out the flame of the lamp in his room?
He's a white-haired child with new hair on his head.
(Throwing his seed blue).
"It's a brilliant, clear light.
There's nothing in the whole world that hides it.
Sound isn't cast out, and form isn't revealed.
How can form be revealed?
It directly cuts through nails and sharp edges.
He breaks through the paths of the past and present.
He rises high above Linji Deshan.
Three people realized that the tortoise had become a turtle.
They are separated.
Once they've eaten water, they'll choke once.
(Yuanwuqin).
Three people realized that the turtle had become a turtle.
At the bottom of the well, the mud and cow choke on their breath.
It's straightforward to argue and pour out a hanging river.
Even when there's truth, it's difficult to separate the snow.
His or her lone light is always bright and clear.
(Tai, the nature of the Buddha).
Three people realize that a turtle has become a turtle.
One puff of the vulture's wind blows it away.
From here, a needle is pierced through the darkness.
There are seven flowers and eight tears in his nostrils.
(Shui'an I).
Three people realized that the turtle had become a turtle.
They've just let slip the secrets of divine providence.
The woodcutter sings on the mountain.
Blood drips from the stone lady's eyes.
(It takes a lazy person to do this).
"There's a bright lamp inside the house.
It's just been put out with a single stroke.
Naturally, he doesn't debate things.
He'll prevent the witness turtle from becoming a turtle.
(Dui'an Qi).

source_sentence: 禪宗頌古聯珠通集卷第三十五
translation: Chanzong chanson gu lianzhu tongji vol. 35
